title: Do Patti
overview: In the fictional hilly town of Devipur, police inspector Vidya Jyothi finds herself drawn to a series of unsettling events involving Saumya and her husband Dhruv Sood. When Saumyaâ€™s twin sister, Shailee, suddenly arrives at the hill station, her intrigue deepens, leaving Vidya to question whether anything is truly as it seems within this web of half-truths and half-lies.
